subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The coach of Juventus, the premier soccer club in Italy, resigned the same day that prosecutors in Italy's match-fixing scandal said they would seek to demote the team from the first to the lowest division and strip it of two league titles.
snippet: The coach of Juventus, the premier soccer club in Italy, resigned the same day that prosecutors in Italy's match-fixing scandal said they would seek to demote the team from the first to the lowest division and strip it of two league titles.
